column3: It's not a game. It's secretly sending invites to our friends in fb without our permission. Report it as spam

However its always a lie considering there is no multiplayer functionality.  Having t...Full ReviewCant play it without connecting to facebook to "play with friends". Yet there is no multiplayer functionality whatsoever & to add to it, the app has notificatiin spam telling you a friend wants to play against you. However its always a lie considering there is no multiplayer functionality.  Having to connect your fb account to it for false promises is very fishy.
